mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from system_msg
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into system_msg (msg_id, send_uid, title, msg_content, msg_type, status, create_time, update_time, dept_id, msg_content_txt, org_id) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContentTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
